column1: Which of the following is the oldest Veda?(Rig Veda/Sama Veda/Yajur Veda/Atharva Veda)
Which of the following animals was considered most important during the Vedic Age?(goat/cow/sheep/horse)
Which of the following word was/were used to describe the masses?
The archaeological sources for the Vedic Age (Painted grey ware/black and red ware/both of them/none of them)
Which of the following was the Vedic Sky God? (Varuna/Agni/Vayu/Indra)
Which of the follwing was the intoxicating drink?(soma/coffee/both of them/none of them)
